thread.title: 22 Guys From The '00s That Everyone Crushed On Then Vs Now
thread.title_full: 22 Guys From The '00s That Everyone Crushed On Then Vs Now

author: Michelle Rennex
title: 22 Guys From The '00s That Everyone Crushed On Then Vs Now
text:
Then: Obviously started the choker trend. Iconic. 
Now: He looks like an off-brand Justin Bieber.
ID: 10754050 2. Chad Michael Murray Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Cute. Trendy with his spiky hair. Wore this t-shirt/collared shirt combo tho. Points must be taken away.
Now: Aged like a fine wine. Learned how to raise eyebrow for photos. Nice.
ID: 10753240 3. Zac Efron Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Was definitely wearing a hat before this photo. It was probably a snapback. 
Now: Definition of a perfect glow-up. His hair even does that flick thing. Good job.
ID: 10753269 4. Lil Bow Wow Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: You just knew he was going to grow up to be fine. 
Now: You were 100% correct.
ID: 10753441 5. Channing Tatum Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Step Up was a great film. Had that “bad boy your mum told you not to go near” vibe. 
Now: Is a dad now. Idk. Hair is still kinda spiky? I guess?
ID: 10753302 6. Pete Wentz Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Um, there was a lot going on with ’00s Pete Wentz. The guyliner, the hair, just wow. 
Now: Stubble makes everything better. He’s also a dad now. He gets DILF points.
ID: 10753391 7. Ben McKenzie Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: not my flavour. But I’m going to be attacked in the comments if he’s not in here. 
Now: Tbh he kinda looks the same. He just started to push his hair back which is good. Nice paisley tie. Different. Unusual. I approve.
ID: 10753515 8. Corbin Bleu Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: That baby blue button-up is really something. Props to him. 
Now: Less fro, more chest hair. Same shirt, different colour.
ID: 10754247 9. Adam Brody Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Nerdy. Cute. Curly hair. Dimples. Just wow. 
Now: He just grew some stubble and stopped smiling with his teeth. Still would. 10/10.
ID: 10753564 10. Wilmer Valderrama Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Cute. Looks looks like an off-duty model. 
Now: He got more stubble and lost the beanie. I approve.
ID: 10754205 11. Jesse McCartney Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Rewind it back 10 years ago and I would’ve given him my “Beautiful Soul”. ;)
Now: He’s got dark hair now. That’s nice, a bit of a change is always good.
ID: 10753897 12. Ashton Kutcher Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: He was that weird kind of sexy. The goofy kind of sexy. Plus he had a lot of hair. 
Now: Tbh I think he looks better older. Or it could be the tuxedo. Who knows?
ID: 10753926 13. John Cho Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Spiky hair was really the style of the ’00s it seems.
Now: Pushed that hair back. Good decision.
ID: 10754258 14. Jared Leto Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Look at those big, beautiful blue eyes. Amazing areas. 
Now: He looks the same. Which means he’s still beautiful. Great stuff.
ID: 10754034 15. Usher Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Hat to the side so you know he’s extra cool. 
Now: That fur throw makes him look like he’s really warm. Classy. Nice.
ID: 10754119 16. Nick Lachey Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: This really isn’t my vibe but people loved Newlyweds: The First Year so here we are. 
Now: He literally looks the same. He’s just a little less orange.
ID: 10754149 17. Nicholas Hoult Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: A cutie with an awkward haircut. 
Now: There was no way he was going to grow up looking anything other than beautiful.
ID: 10754332 18. Dev Patel Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Adorable and dorky-looking. 
Now: A great glow-up. One for the history books.
ID: 10754301 19. Joe Jonas Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: So young. So very, very young. 
Now: Mmmmhmmm, I told you beards fix everything.
ID: 10754344 20. Jake Gyllenhaal Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: I’m not going to lie, I didn’t know who Jake was until the last few years. I have no opinions. 
Now: He looks like a wolf with his beard now. I’m here for it.
ID: 10754358 21. Taylor Lautner Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: Real-life porcupine aesthetic. 
Now: Stubble? Check. Less spikes? Check. Perfect. That’s all we need.
ID: 10754350 22. And Justin Timberlake Getty Images
Getty Images
  Then: I don’t know what the fuck his ’00s look was. Did people find this attractive? Anyone?
Now: Beards make everything better. Plus his new hair is a real improvement but one of his eyes look fake. I need an explanation.
ID: 10754014 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Michelle Rennex is a staff writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
